nodes.text: Gehn's Overlook was an outpost of the Voss commandos in the Nightmare Lands of the planet Voss that was used as a base by the Sith Empire. The name came from the Sith Lord Murbek Gehn, who resided in a building atop a rocky spire next to the main outpost in the Crysfang Glade.

Gehn's Overlook appears as the Imperial base in the Nightmare Lands on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The spelling of "Gehn" varies between the maps, mission logs, and other in-game text, with some instances spelling it "Ghen."
